description: From French sombre  +â€Ž -ous. Compare Spanish sombroso.

adjectives.description: sombrous (comparative more sombrous, superlative most sombrous)

examples: Before me rose an avenue / Of tall and sombrous pines; / Abroad their fan-like branches grew, / And, where the sunshine darted through, / Spread a vapor soft and blue, / In long and sloping lines.
